name: Cross Country Express - An Oddfellows Mini
name_original: Cross Country Express - An Oddfellows Mini
description:
The first in the new line of "Mini series" from Oddfellows Software:

The classic "Cross Country" released in 1983 by ScrolgoVision Corp now updated for the modern age in "Cross Country Express".
- All new environments, more variety, an updated score system and jumping animations are at your disposal.
Cross America in a wild goose chase to collect your flock before the annual farm pageant.
Leap across a seemingly never-ending assortment of fences, barrels and trees.
Dare you complete the campaign? If the compressed classic screams are not enough of a warning, the sheer speed of the obstacles will be.
All of this and more for a classic low OddFellows price.
You cant go wrong with a simple yet challenging game like this, readers!
